I am currently a Software Engineer at Cerner Corporation located in Kansas City, Missouri. I recently graduated with a Master's Degree in Computer Science from School of Informatics & Computing, Indiana University Bloomington. I focused on Machine Learning, Data mining and Artificial Intelligence along with software development.
